item.title: Error: Cant add drops to jad
item.dc:creator: @DrPepper DrPepper
item.description:
@DrPepper wrote:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 18) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomguard(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

in npc handler something like that should be there

Have the random stuff in item2 then in npc handler put this with the rest of them

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomTzTok-Jad(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

item.title: Error: Cant add drops to jad
item.dc:creator: @Emo_Life_Sux Emo_Life_Sux
item.description:
@Emo_Life_Sux wrote:

when i tried to add a random drop to jad i got these errors

Item2.java:31: ‘;’ expected
public static int TzTok-Jad[] = {6570,6570,6570,6570,6522,6522,6522,6522,6522,65
23,6523,6523,6523,6523,6524,6524,6524,6524,6524,6525,6525,6525,6525,6525,6526,65
26,6526,6526,6526,6527,6527,6527,6527,6527,6528,6528,6528,6528,6528};
^
Item2.java:31: expected
public static int TzTok-Jad[] = {6570,6570,6570,6570,6522,6522,6522,6522,6522,65
23,6523,6523,6523,6523,6524,6524,6524,6524,6524,6525,6525,6525,6525,6525,6526,65
26,6526,6526,6526,6527,6527,6527,6527,6527,6528,6528,6528,6528,6528};
^
Item2.java:33: ‘;’ expected
public static int randomTzTok-Jad()
^
Item2.java:33: invalid method declaration; return type required
public static int randomTzTok-Jad()
^
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Whats this mean??

Read full topic
